results.name: Number of nonzero quadratic residues (mod n) (cf. A000224).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
S. R. Finch and Pascal Sebah, Squares and Cubes Modulo n, arXiv:math/0604465 [math.NT], 2006-2016.
E. J. F. Primrose, The number of quadratic residues mod m, Math. Gaz. v. 61 (1977) n. 415, 60-61.
W. D. Stangl, Counting Squares in Z_n, Mathematics Magazine, pp. 285-289, Vol. 69 No. 4 (October 1996).
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Quadratic Residue
program: (PARI) /* based on code by _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, see A000224 */
(PARI) a(n)=my(f=factor(n)); prod(i=1, #f[, 1], if(f[i, 1]==2, 2^f[1, 2]\6+2, f[i, 1]^(f[i, 2]+1)\(2*f[i, 1]+2)+1))-1 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 10 2013
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Apr 15 2005
